Detailed Description

Provides useful debugging functions.

Version:
1.1

static backtrace ( $  return = false  )  [static]

Returns a formatted string backtrace.

Parameters:
bool $return When true output is returned, not displayed.
Returns:
mixed A pretty formatted backtrace if $return is true, void otherwise.

Bookmark a variable value.

Bookmarks the current value of the reference indexed by $key with bookmark $bookmark.
